nodes.text: Imroosia was a volcanic planet and the homeworld of the Imroosian species. They developed flinty, chalk-like skin to resist their home's searing temperatures. Margo, a member of Dryden Vos' concierge aboard the First Light, originated from the planet. She disliked the hot environment and reveled in her posting on the yacht, with no desire to return.

Imroosia was first mentioned in Solo: A Star Wars Story The Official Guide, a 2018 reference book written by Pablo Hidalgo, where it was simply referred to as a volcanic planet. It was first identified in the 2019 reference book Ultimate Star Wars, New Edition.
